    Current Projects

    • CONTRIBUTE

      The purpose of this task is to map buildings. It's very easy and great for beginners! read more.

    • CONTRIBUTE

      PADF is working in the municipality of Mixco, Guatemala, to train, equip, and organize neighborhood-based disaster preparation and response initiatives, as well as implement small-scale disaster resilient infrastructure improvement projects based on community-driven vulnerability risk and needs assessments. This mapping... read more.

    • CONTRIBUTE

      This project is to trace buildings, and missing major roads, in this region of Guatemala. This project is friendly to new mappers with good imagery available across a mostly rural area. Your mapping contribution will help prevent the suffering and... read more.

    • CONTRIBUTE

      This project is to trace buildings, and missing major roads, in this region of Guatemala. This project may require using and adjusting multiple imagery sources. Your mapping contribution will help prevent the suffering and loss of life the disease malaria... read more.
